Testimonials.title: Our Philosophy
Testimonials.subtitle: Why we built GitSprint
Testimonials.heading: Built for speed,
Testimonials.description: We're on a mission to reduce developer friction.

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.content: meetup revolutionized how we track sprints. What used to take 30 minutes now takes 5. Our team velocity has never been higher.

items.name: Michael Chen
items.content: The minimal interface is exactly what we needed. No clutter, just pure productivity. Our sprint planning is twice as fast now.

items.name: Emily Rodriguez
items.content: Finally, a sprint tool that doesn't get in the way. Our developers actually enjoy updating their progress now. Game changer for our daily standups.

items.name: David Kim
items.content: We've tried every sprint tool out there. meetup is the only one that truly understands minimalism. One-click updates are a lifesaver.

items.name: Lisa Thompson
items.content: Our sprint velocity increased by 35% after adopting meetup. The clean UI and smart features make tracking effortless.

items.name: Alex Rivera
items.content: The keyboard shortcuts and quick actions are brilliant. I can update my entire sprint status in under a minute. This is how sprint tools should be.

changePlan.question: Can I change my plan at any time?
changePlan.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any charges.

freeTrial.question: Is there a free trial?
freeTrial.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial for all paid plans. No credit card required to start.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for Enterprise customers.

refunds.question: Do you offer refunds?
refunds.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, we'll refund your payment.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about meetup. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team.

q1.question: What is meetup and how does it work?
q1.answer: meetup is a minimalistic sprint tracking tool designed to maximize team productivity. With our philosophy of minimum clicks, you can track progress, manage sprints, and collaborate with your team in seconds, not minutes.

q2.question: How does the 'minimum clicks' philosophy work?
q2.answer: We've designed every interaction to require the fewest possible clicks. One-click updates, keyboard shortcuts, smart defaults, and intuitive UI mean you spend less time managing tasks and more time building products.

q3.question: Can I use meetup for agile methodologies?
q3.answer: Absolutely! meetup is built specifically for agile teams. Whether you use Scrum, Kanban, or a custom methodology, our flexible sprint tracking adapts to your workflow.

q4.question: How does team collaboration work?
q4.answer: meetup enables real-time collaboration with your team. See updates instantly, share progress with one click, and keep everyone aligned without unnecessary meetings or status reports.

q5.question: Is meetup secure for handling sensitive project data?
q5.answer: Yes, security is a top priority. meetup includes enterprise-grade security features like encrypted data storage, secure authentication, GDPR compliance, and regular security audits.

q6.question: Can I integrate meetup with other tools?
q6.answer: Yes! We offer integrations with popular tools like GitHub, Slack, and more. Our API allows for custom integrations to fit perfectly into your existing workflow.

q7.question: What kind of support do you provide?
q7.answer: We offer multiple support channels: community forums, detailed documentation, video tutorials, and priority email support for Pro users. Enterprise customers get dedicated support.

q8.question: Can I import data from other sprint tools?
q8.answer: Yes! meetup supports importing from popular sprint tracking tools. We also provide migration guides to help you transition smoothly from your current tool.

q9.question: How do you handle sprint analytics?
q9.answer: meetup provides simple yet powerful analytics. Track sprint velocity, team productivity, completion rates, and identify bottlenecks without overwhelming you with complex dashboards.

q10.question: What's your refund policy?
q10.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans. If you're not completely satisfied with meetup, we'll refund your payment, no questions asked.
